descriptionlist.description: Back at it again, adding even more icons to Lotus Dark.

This theme adds icons for more apps with the Lotus Dark style.

  • Adobe Fill & Sign
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Premiere Rush
  • Adobe Scan
  • Adope Lightroom for iPad
  • Asphalt 8 - Drift Racing Game
  • Citrix Workspace
  • DolphiniOS
  • Funda
  • GitHub
  • Greenchoice
  • iCleaner Pro
  • Installer
  • Keybase
  • Microsoft Teams
  • Mijn KPN
  • Mijn Robeco
  • Mijn Zilveren Kruis
  • nControl
  • New York Pizza (Dutch variant)
  • NOS
  • NPO
  • Picnic
  • PluralSight
  • Pokemon Home
  • The Game of Life 2
  • Ubiquiti UniFi Network
  • Working Copy
No screenshots for this item. No options to configure. Toggle the theme in Anemone / Snowboard

changelog.change: Marked this package as safe for rootless jailbreak
